summary: This bill, the "Ensuring Accountability and Dignity in Government Contracting Act of 2025," focuses on modifying and strengthening regulations related to trafficking in persons within government contracts. It mandates incident reporting for potential trafficking activities, requires the Inspector General to investigate such reports, and details corrective actions. Furthermore, it directs the Office of Management and Budget to report to Congress on the feasibility of assessing contractor compliance with anti-trafficking plans and streamlining agency reporting on these issues.
